# Planning Documents

Internal planning and roadmap documents for boxes-live development.

## Contents

- [ROADMAP.md](ROADMAP.md) - Feature roadmap and development phases

## Development Phases

| Phase | Focus | Status |
|-------|-------|--------|
| Phase 1 | Foundation (dynamic canvas, persistence) | Complete |
| Phase 2 | Smart Canvas (editing, connections, colors) | Partial |
| Phase 3 | Game Engine (entities, physics, animation) | Planned |
| Phase 4 | Productivity (tasks, search, markdown) | Planned |
| Phase 5 | Large Maps (chunks, tiles, layers) | Planned |
| Phase 6 | Polish (performance, plugins, docs) | Planned |

## Contributing Ideas

Have a feature idea? Open an issue with the `enhancement` label.

For major features, please discuss in an issue before starting work.
